title.en: Prayer to Longchenpa (Adapted from the Words of Mipham Rinpoche)

text.en: The primordial and spontaneous nature of luminous awareness
Is unchanging and of one-taste with all the victorious buddhas.
text.en-trans: gyurmé gyalwa kün dang ronyam pa

text.en: To you who have perceived this directly, Omniscient Lord of Dharma,
text.en-trans: ngönsum zikpa künkhyen chö kyi jé
drimé özer zhab la solwa deb

text.en: With your brilliant, stainless insight you have clearly and unerringly understood
text.en-trans: tek chok lung dön tsang la manorwa

text.en: The meaning of the supreme vehicle in its entirety
text.en-trans: drimé rikpé tsul zang saljé ching

text.en: And are possessed of the pith instructions of profound key points:
text.en-trans: zabmo né kyi mengak dang denpa

text.en: To the collection of your speech—fine explanations all—I pray!
text.en-trans: sung rab lek shé tsok la solwa deb

text.en: The lion's roar that is the beautiful speech of buddhas and bodhisattvas
text.en-trans: sé ché gyalwé sung yang sengé dré

text.en: Has prophesied that you, protector, will awaken
And be renowned as the guide Rirab Marmé Gyaltsen.
At that time may I and all parent beings gather
text.en-trans: ngönpar changchub nyepa dé yi tsé

text.en: At the place of your enlightenment as youthful bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: dak dang dak gi magyur drowa kün

text.en: And, having enjoyed the nectar of your true words,
text.en-trans: zhing der gyalsé zhönnü namrol gyi

text.en: Receive a prophecy of our very own —
text.en-trans: den sung chö kyi dütsir longchö né

text.en: That we too will attain the ten powers!
text.en-trans: tob chu ngawar lungten nyé gyur chik
